title: Easy Bean Soup
nutrition_tip: Cook a healthy meal in less than 10 minutes with pantry staples.

ingredients.name: beans (15.8 oz cans, great northern beans, rinsed and drained)
diced tomatoes (14.5 oz can, with basil, garlic and oregano)

steps.text: In a medium saucepan, heat oil over medium heat and sauté garlic and onion for 3 minutes or until onion is tender.
Add beans, tomatoes and broth to saucepan. Stir and simmer for 5 minutes. Add kale and cook until tender, for about 2 minutes.
Mix in lemon juice and Parmesan cheese just before serving. Optional, garnish with finely chopped fresh basil or dried basil.
